articles.author: Brian Truitt
articles.title: Best movies of 2023: Our picks for the 10 must-see films of the year - USA TODAY
articles.description: This year has been a great one for movies, both blockbusters and Oscar-ready fare. Here are the 10 best of 2023, ranked (from "Air" to "Barbie").
articles.content:
Y'all, this was a great year in film.
There have been pretty stellar ones in the past (1984 boasted "Ghostbusters," "Beverly Hills Cop," "Amadeus," "The Terminator" and "Footloose") but 2023's film … [+5972 chars]
